general.descriptionTextModule: Modul to migrate data from Shopware 5

introduction.contentTitle: Launch Shopware Playground with your own data.
introduction.contentInformation: Migrate your data from Shopware 5 to Shopware Playground and create your own projects. Explore the possibilities of Shopware Playground with real data.

pluginInformation.contentInformation: Use your access data to log into the Shopware 5 backend and open the plugin manager. To get started, download and activate the free plugin 'Shopware Playground Connector'. No additional input or settings are required.

credentials.contentInformation: The API key can be found within the administration of your user data. Please activate the API access, copy the API key to your clipboard and confirm by saving.

success.contentInformation: Click on Finish and select in the migration module the data sets to be transferred. The data can be migrated completely, step by step or subsequently.

error.contentInformation: Unfortunately, the connection could not be established. Please refer to the error messages and try again.
error.connectionErrorMsg: Could not connect to the server. Please check the given shop domain.
error.authenticationErrorMsg: Your access data is not correct. Please check it and try again.
error.undefinedErrorMsg: Internal server error. Please try again.

index.title: Migration
index.browserClosingHint: Do you really want to abort the migration?

selectDataCard.hint: The selected data is transferred with language versions and created subshops. This data has relevant dependencies that are necessary for the completeness of the migration.

loadingScreenCard.hint: Please remain logged in and do not delete any data in the other shop system until the process is complete. You can work in the system, the process continues in the background.

confirmDialog.title: Migration
confirmDialog.message: Do you really want to migrate?
